title: New: Savages – Husbands
content:
It’s been a rollercoaster six months for Savages.

Since forming in October last year, their terrifyingly intense live shows have caused quite a stir, despite the fact that as of this morning, they had no recorded material whatsoever to their name. Premiered via Pitchfork earlier today, Husbands is a perfect 70’s inspired number, three minutes in length and startlingly vivid, dominated by the snarling vocals of lead singer Jehnny Beth. Set to be the B-side to their forthcoming debut single Flying to Berlin out 28 May, Savages have announced their arrival in the most thrilling way possible. Believe the hype. Check out Husbands below and listened to our interview with the group here.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
